title: NeWest Smart Photo Import v2.2.2
description:
NeWest Smart Photo Import v2.2.2

Sort the Chaos in your picture files!

Ever experienced that uncomfortable feeling of having your picture files spread all-over your PC, with meaningless names and in highly unorganized fashion?

Unique in its conception, Smart Import is a Digital Media Importer and Sorter that can assist you in the task of organizing your digital shots.
The software can perform different tasks, the primary of which is taking photos and videos from your camera or other device (PC Drive, flash, memory cards etc..), and copying/moving them to a chosen destination, while performing  an automatic rename by subject, date or other criteria. It also creates all the specified folder structure, by the criteria you choose.

You can choose to organize and rename files by subject, description, date.

Smart Import browser can display all common picture formats and a very great number of Raw Formats. You can preview, edit and annotate the pictures. During the import operation the program can correct automatically the orientation of the pictures using the Exif information of the files.

Another task is reorganizing your existing archive of files on your pc. You can just drag-drop your existing files and folders from windows explorer into Smart Import browser and then reorganize them, by choosing your criteria and moving the files to the better destinations of your choice.

Not only pictures. Smart Import can reorganize all types of media. You can also apply the reorganizing to non-media formats such as text documents and any format of your choice.

Loads Fast, Start Viewing your pictures Immediately!
Very Easy to use once you familiarize with its interface.
Supports over 150 digital camera RAW formats. (Click here for the list)
Has File lossless Rotation options with automatic detection
Offers a very comfortable browser with shell capabilities.
Has Undo option to cancel the last import operation
Lets you preview how the files will be imported / copied. You can click on each import item and instantly check the file to which it belongs in the browser
Offers flexibility in file renaming and in folder creation. Can create automatically indented folders for each Year/ Month and day of the shot
Lets you convert files  into another graphics format.
Finally you can print your picture collections, just like an album, including most important file and exif information.

Official Website: http://www.nwspro.com/products/smart-photo-import.html
